import React, { Component } from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' class Checkout extends Component { render() { let total = 0; this.props.cart.map(item => total += item.product.price * item.quantity) return (

Enter your billing address to pay: {total === 0.000 ? null : `[$` + total.toFixed(2) + `]`}

{}} />
Valid first name is required.
{}} />

@
Your username is required.
Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.
Please enter your shipping address.
Please select a valid country.
Please provide a valid state.
Zip code required.

{}} />
Full name as displayed on card
Name on card is required
Credit card number is required
Expiration date required
Security code required
); } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { cart: state.cart.cart } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, {})(Checkout);
